column2: df_final = EEC_2019 %>% select(liste_variable) # Garde uniquement les variables contenus dans liste_variable

Avis : Using an external vector in selections was deprecated in tidyselect 1.1.0.
Please use `all_of()` or `any_of()` instead.
# Was:
data %>% select(liste_variable)

# Now:
data %>% select(all_of(liste_variable))

See <https://tidyselect.r-lib.org/reference/faq-external-vector.html>.
